Description: The following statement contains a magic number: const int Hashrate = 1000000;

The following statement contains a magic number: apiUrl = String.Format("{0}&{1}Power=0&{1}HashRate={2}"'                   apiUrl'                  AlgorithmNames.SHA256.ToLower()'                  AlgorithmMultipliers.SHA256 * Hashrate                  //API wants Gh/s                  / 1000 / 1000);

The following statement contains a magic number: apiUrl = String.Format("{0}&{1}Power=0&{1}HashRate={2}"'                   apiUrl'                  AlgorithmNames.SHA256.ToLower()'                  AlgorithmMultipliers.SHA256 * Hashrate                  //API wants Gh/s                  / 1000 / 1000);

The following statement contains a magic number: apiUrl = String.Format("{0}&{1}Power=0&{1}HashRate={2}"'                  apiUrl'                  AlgorithmNames.Keccak.ToLower()'                  AlgorithmMultipliers.Keccak * Hashrate                  //API wants Mh/s                  / 1000);

The following statement contains a magic number: apiUrl = String.Format("{0}&{1}Power=0&{1}HashRate={2}"'                  apiUrl'                  AlgorithmNames.Groestl.ToLower()'                  AlgorithmMultipliers.Groestl * Hashrate                  //API wants Mh/s                  / 1000);
